participant_1.background:
I've been with my dog for 10 years.
I spend my days reading about politics and economics, and trying to understand how the world works.
I was so proud of myself when I won the spelling bee.
I think my brother's job is really cool.
I like to catch up on my reading about business and finance on a rainy day.

participant_2.background:
My border collies are my best friends.
i am a foodie.
I like to eat strawberries when I want a sweet treat.
i listen to music for more than 5 hours a day.
I have gray hair but I still love to read to my grandchildren.

content.text: Hello there. What do you do for fun?
I like to read, cook and listen to music.  What about you?
I like to read about politics and business. I am a huge history buff.
That is so interesting! I like to read cookbooks. I love cooking.
What do you like to cook?
I like to cook all kinds of food. But I really love to cook Italian food.
That sounds delicious! What is your favorite Italian dish to cook?
I love to make pasta. I make my own pasta from scratch.
That is so cool! I do not have the patience to make my own pasta.
It is really easy to make. You should try it sometime.
I will! I love to cook so I am always looking for new recipes.
That is great! I love to share recipes.
That is awesome! I love to try new recipes.
I have a lot of recipes that I can share with you.
That would be great! I would love that.
Awesome! I will send you some of my favorite recipes.
That is so great! Thank you.
